data.meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.
data.sentence: The word وَقَعَتِ comes from the root و ق ع and is associated with the meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.

data.meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.
data.sentence: The word الْوَاقِعَةُ comes from the root و ق ع and is associated with the meanings: to fall down, befall, come to pass, be conformed, happen, take place, ascertain.
